Name: THZ
About the game: Arcade style survival at its highest point, fight off hordes of zombies as the Lone Survivor, using plants to assist you as the ever increasing hordes grow wilder and larger. THZ is a simple but silly game focused on customization, with the player character unlocking new costumes and gun colors as they go.
